title: 1.12.2闪退
author: molirendai
txt_content:
自己加的mod，但是只要创建世界生成地形就闪退出来了，有没有dalao帮帮我呀







crash-2019-10-15_08.19.58-server.txt


2019-10-15 08:47 上传
点击文件名下载附件




8.62 KB, 下载次数: 5


崩溃报告

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
I can reproduce this crash with only OptiFine_1.12.2_HD_U_C6 installed. Updating or removing that mod fixes it.
Additionally you should remove mcef-1.12.2-0.9-coremod.jar from your "/mods/1.12.2/" folder. it causes a (different) crash if installed without the normal mcef (mcef-1.12.2-0.9.jar) mod.
https://github.com/MultiMC/MultiMC5/issues/2439
试下更新Optifine，或者删除。
www.optifine.net/downloads
